MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Raeburn Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 2.06PM. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate a suspected substation fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5.15PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2.43PM on 13 March 2021.
